postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Spark is being installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/spark/
	Issues: https://docs.mesosphere.com/support/
postUninstallNotes:
The Apache Spark DC/OS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
Please follow the instructions at http://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/spark/#uninstall to clean up any persisted state.
name: spark
description: Spark is a fast and general cluster computing system for Big Data.  Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/usage/managing-services/spark/
